content: Former budget secretary Florencio Abad and Senators Antonio Trillanes, Leila de Lima, and Franklin Drilon, will soon face charges in connection to the P10-billion pork barrel scam, Justice Vitaliano Aguirre II revealed Monday.
contentPreview: Former budget secretary Florencio Abad and Senators Antonio Trillanes, Leila de Lima, and Franklin Drilon, will soon face charges in connection to the P10-billion pork barrel scam, Justice Vitaliano Aguirre II revealed Monday.
title: Trillanes, De Lima, Drilon, Abad to face new charges - Aguirre
